title: Taylora
description: Taylora is a platform that allows you to share video lessons, ebooks and courses directly with your clients. With a focus on simplicity and security, Taylora lets you upload videos and PDFs, curate them into courses or collections, and automatically present them on a sleek shareable page. Advanced protection, including HLS video streaming and HTML PDF conversion, safeguards your content from unauthorized downloads, giving you full control over access and sharing.
